Package Tools

Class Query

java.lang.Object
Tools.Query
public class Query extends Object
This object is used to exchange messages between client and server.
Author:
Michail Panagiotis Bofos, Demetra Hadjicosti, Ioanna Theofilou, Lucía Jiménez García

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Query​(Viewpoint client)
    To create a query we need the client that is used to create it.
